title: Scattershot

|castingnoise= |spellnoise=a bit loud }} {{flavour|Blasts a cone-shaped area in front of the caster with metallic fragments. Its damage is strongly reduced by armour.}} '''Scattershot''' is a level 6 spell, but as it's only available through an [[iron rod]], [[Evocations]] determines its potency. Each casting will noisily launch several weak iron shots, randomly aiming them within a narrow cone in front of you. Higher Evocations skill will result in more individual shots and a wider cone of coverage. ==Strategy== *While the individual projectiles from Scattershot don't deal terribly much damage on their own, you can fire it at point blank range to increase the chance of multiple shots hitting a single target. *This spell is very effective at taking down opponents with low [[AC]], but as the enemy's defense is applied to each shot, high-AC opponents will drastically reduce the damage dealt. ==History== [[0.20]] moved scattershot into [[wand of scattershot]]. Scattershot was added in [[0.16]]. [[Category:Attack spells]]
